mapper.select: select sim_file_seq, origin_file_name, save_file_name, save_file_path, create_dt from sim_file_master;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO public.sim_file_master (sim_file_seq, origin_file_name, save_file_name, save_file_path, create_dt) VALUES(0, '${origin_file_name}', '${save_file_name}', '${save_file_path}', now())
